scripts.buildInput: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name index --dest lib/xl-input packages/input/index.js
scripts.buildAll: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name index --dest lib/xl-input packages/input/index.js && vue-cli-service build --target lib --name index --dest lib/xl-table packages/table/index.js && vue-cli-service build --target lib --name index --dest lib/xl-table-column packages/tableColumn/index.js
